name: Lilly Token
public_notice:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract - which allows contract owners to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en: Lillian Finance is a medical blockchain company harnessing the power of crypto currency to directly fund the Lillian Bay Foundation to provide life saving children's surgeries
